text.text: Stuck on design? Let me teach you the Thruul method! Start with a goal: want a strong melee weapon? ore miner? wither killer? The more precise your goal the stronger the tool.

Next, identify the most important stats and modifiers to the goal. For melee, might be damage or damage per second. Ore mining may want luck or mining speed. Don't forget "deal breakers", like if you need cheap repair.

Finally, match tool type, materials, and modifiers to whats important. For materials, check the tip icon in the top corner. Also remember conditional modifiers like smite may be stronger than simple stat boosts if you can meet their conditions.
